channel.title: Workshop Mods Can't Change Certain Sound Script Files
channel.description:
From several tests that I've made, I've found that workshop mods cannot edit any of the [b]npc_sounds [/b]script files (such as npc_sounds_abrams.txt) and [b]game_sounds[/b] script files (such as game_sounds_ambient_generic.txt).
I figured this to be a bug, since there are other script files that mods *are* able to change, such as the soundscape script files and sentences.txt for example.

item.title: Workshop Mods Can't Change Certain Sound Script Files
item.dc:creator: Mr_GameCrazy
item.description:
Workshop mods can’t modify caption files either.

Read full topic
item.source: Workshop Mods Can't Change Certain Sound Script Files

item.title: Workshop Mods Can't Change Certain Sound Script Files

item.description:
From several tests that I’ve made, I’ve found that workshop mods cannot edit any of the npc_sounds script files (such as npc_sounds_abrams.txt) and game_sounds script files (such as game_sounds_ambient_generic.txt).

I figured this to be a bug, since there are other script files that mods are able to change, such as the soundscape script files and sentences.txt for example.
